ygData.subject: Re: Glowing Stein quest
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Ah huvn t done the quest in a long time but tha last time Ah did it weeks (since before tha quest was ever spoiled on any of tha popular spoiler sites), 3
ygData.messageBody:
>From: MFerrulo@...
>
>In a message dated 9/13/99 1:44:13 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
>reuben@... writes:
>
><<
> I have a question about the quest.. I am helping my enchanter friend with
> the quest, and I was wondering.. If I get the items at the same time, ie
>she
> has one set and i have my own.. if by the end of the quest, i can give
>her
> the stuff I've got and she can complete it for me.. or is any of the
>stuff
> No drop ? This way she can get a stein and I can get a stein also ? Oh
>yeah
> i am high elf mage, so I know I can't get the item myself..
>
> Thanks
>
> Reuben

Ah huvn't done the quest in a long time but tha last time Ah did it weeks
(since before tha quest was ever spoiled on any of tha popular spoiler
sites), 3 of the 4 items to git the No Drop book were Lore an' none were No
Drop. Yer friend would huv to then turn in her set of ingriediants ta git
tha No Drop book. Ye kin then give her yer set. She would then need ta do
tha final leg of tha quest.

Now, Ah had suggested on another list along time ago that tha quest needed
to be made harder by makin' the fish a No Drop item. Ah huv since heard
that, that may huv been done. Whether it was done one tha test server or
all of the productions servers, Ah don' know it's been many.

Lincus
E'ci
